00042 #ifndef _LUSTRE_IDMAP_H
00043 #define _LUSTRE_IDMAP_H
00044 
00050 #include <libcfs/libcfs.h>
00051 
00052 #define CFS_NGROUPS_PER_BLOCK   ((int)(PAGE_CACHE_SIZE / sizeof(gid_t)))
00053 
00054 #define CFS_GROUP_AT(gi, i) \
00055         ((gi)->blocks[(i) / CFS_NGROUPS_PER_BLOCK][(i) % CFS_NGROUPS_PER_BLOCK])
00056 
00057 enum {
00058         CFS_IC_NOTHING     = 0,    /* convert nothing */
00059         CFS_IC_ALL         = 1,    /* convert all items */
00060         CFS_IC_MAPPED      = 2,    /* convert mapped uid/gid */
00061         CFS_IC_UNMAPPED    = 3     /* convert unmapped uid/gid */
00062 };
00063 
00064 #define  CFS_IDMAP_NOTFOUND     (-1)
00065 
00066 #define CFS_IDMAP_HASHSIZE      32
00067 
00068 enum lustre_idmap_idx {
00069         RMT_UIDMAP_IDX,
00070         LCL_UIDMAP_IDX,
00071         RMT_GIDMAP_IDX,
00072         LCL_GIDMAP_IDX,
00073         CFS_IDMAP_N_HASHES
00074 };
00075 
00076 struct lustre_idmap_table {
00077         spinlock_t       lit_lock;
00078         struct list_head lit_idmaps[CFS_IDMAP_N_HASHES][CFS_IDMAP_HASHSIZE];
00079 };
00080 
00081 struct lu_ucred;
00082 
00083 extern void lustre_groups_from_list(struct group_info *ginfo, gid_t *glist);
00084 extern void lustre_groups_sort(struct group_info *group_info);
00085 extern int lustre_in_group_p(struct lu_ucred *mu, gid_t grp);
00086 
00087 extern int lustre_idmap_add(struct lustre_idmap_table *t,
00088                             uid_t ruid, uid_t luid,
00089                             gid_t rgid, gid_t lgid);
00090 extern int lustre_idmap_del(struct lustre_idmap_table *t,
00091                             uid_t ruid, uid_t luid,
00092                             gid_t rgid, gid_t lgid);
00093 extern int lustre_idmap_lookup_uid(struct lu_ucred *mu,
00094                                    struct lustre_idmap_table *t,
00095                                    int reverse, uid_t uid);
00096 extern int lustre_idmap_lookup_gid(struct lu_ucred *mu,
00097                                    struct lustre_idmap_table *t,
00098                                    int reverse, gid_t gid);
00099 extern struct lustre_idmap_table *lustre_idmap_init(void);
00100 extern void lustre_idmap_fini(struct lustre_idmap_table *t);
00101 
00104 #endif
